info.title: group.one Centralized License Service API
info.description: Multi-tenant, multi-brand license management system API. All endpoints require API key authentication.

post.description: Activate a license key on a specific device. Returns activation details if successful.

400.description: Activation failed - Invalid key, expired, or max activations reached

post.description: Deactivate an active license activation, freeing up an activation slot

get.description: Check the activation status of a license key, optionally for a specific device

parameters.name: device_identifier
parameters.description: Optional device identifier to check specific device activation

get.description: Retrieve a list of all brands (tenants) in the system. Returns brands scoped to the authenticated API key.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

post.description: Create a new brand (tenant) in the system

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific brand by ID
Retrieve a paginated list of licenses for the authenticated brand

post.description: Create a new license for a customer

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific license

put.description: Update license details such as expiration date or activation limits

ApiKeyAuth.description: Enter your API key in the format: lcs_xxxxxxxx.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

tags.name: Brands
tags.description: Brand management endpoints - Brands represent tenants in the system

tags.name: Licenses
tags.description: License management endpoints - Create and manage licenses for brands

tags.name: Activations
tags.description: License activation endpoints - Activate, deactivate, and check activation status
